issue.title: [CF 125] Ability to detect states, like macros does
issue.body:
It would be very nice if the condition could include much of the things that macros can detect ([swimming][mounted][group:party], etc).

Example.... reminding me about my DKs Presence: I want the condition to be "remind of of blood presence if I'm in a group, not mounted, don't have the buff and is in spec 2".

Right now I have it on spec 2, and buff not available. That however mean that if I'm in spec 2 and flying around Stormwind in unholy presence (for faster movement) I'm still getting the reminder.

I can't seem to find a way to detect if I'm mounted, swimming, in a group, and other such things. Any way they could be added to the condition?


> Posted by CurseForge user Exaid | Imported from CurseForge issue #125 | Raw

comments.body:
I will add a condition for swimming and mounted. As far as party goes, if unit "party1" exists, then you are in a party (using Unit Exists condition type).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

That's a little non-obvious for the layman maybe... But, at least I'll know, and I'll take what I can get. :) Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user Exaid
